Interface HtmlTag

public interface HtmlTag
Represents an HTML tag.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    HtmlTag.FormattingHint
    Represents formatting hints for handling line breaks around tags.
    static enum 
    HtmlTag.TagType
    Enum representing the type of an HTML tag.

  • Method Details

    • tag

      static HtmlTag tag(String open, String close)
      Create a new simple tag.
      Parameters:
      open - text of the opening tag
      close - text of the closing tag
      Returns:
      the new tag

    • headerTag

      static HtmlTag headerTag(String open, String close, int level)
      Creates an HTML header tag with the specified opening and closing tag texts, and a header level. The header level indicates the importance of the header (e.g., h1, h2, etc.).
      Parameters:
      open - the text for the opening tag
      close - the text for the closing tag
      level - an OptionalInt specifying the header level; if the header level is not defined, use -1
      Returns:
      a new HtmlTag instance representing the header tag with the given parameters

    • tag

      static HtmlTag tag(String open, String close, HtmlTag.FormattingHint formattingHint)
      Creates a new HTML tag with the specified opening and closing tags and a formatting hint.
      Parameters:
      open - the text for the opening tag
      close - the text for the closing tag
      formattingHint - the HtmlTag.FormattingHint to specify whether line breaks are allowed before or after the tag
      Returns:
      the newly created HTML tag as an instance of HtmlTag

    • combineTags

      static HtmlTag combineTags(HtmlTag... tags)
      Combines multiple HtmlTag instances into a single HtmlTag. If no tags are provided, the method returns an empty tag. If exactly one tag is provided, it is returned as is. If multiple tags are provided, they are combined into a compound tag.
      Parameters:
      tags - an array of HtmlTag instances to be combined
      Returns:
      a single HtmlTag that represents the combination of the input tags

    • emptyTag

      static HtmlTag emptyTag()
      The empty tag.
      Returns:
      the empty tag

    • open

      String open()
      Get text for the opening tag.
      Returns:
      opening tag

    • close

      String close()
      Get text for the closing tag.
      Returns:
      closing tag

    • formattingHint

      HtmlTag.FormattingHint formattingHint()
      Retrieves the HtmlTag.FormattingHint associated with this HTML tag. The formatting hint specifies whether line breaks are allowed before and/or after the tag in text processing or rendering.
      Returns:
      the HtmlTag.FormattingHint indicating line break preferences for the tag

    • getTag

      default String getTag(HtmlTag.TagType type)
      Retrieves the representation of a tag based on the specified tag type.
      Parameters:
      type - the HtmlTag.TagType that indicates whether to retrieve the opening or closing tag
      Returns:
      the corresponding tag as a String, either the opening tag or the closing tag

    • headerChange

      int headerChange()
      Retrieves the header level associated with the tag, if available. A header level is typically used to represent hierarchical importance of a section in HTML (e.g., h1, h2, etc.).
      Returns:
      an OptionalInt containing the header level if it is defined; otherwise, an empty OptionalInt.
